input_text:
Job Title: Computer Science Intern

Location: Dayton, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Overview

Woolpert, Inc. is a cutting-edge national architecture, engineering and geospatial (AEG) firm that delivers value to clients by blending site and architectural design excellence with innovative technology and geospatial applications. Woolpert is certified as an Employer of Choice by Great Place To Work®. We believe great companies are built from exceptional people and amazing clients. Because of our growth, we are seeking an experienced Computer Science Intern.

Join us for an internship experience that offers real-world project involvement within a supportive environment alongside ample opportunities for professional and personal growth. At this time, we are seeking 1 Computer Science (or similar) for the summer semester (May/June-August); this position will be working with a fully remote team. This internship will be a full-time position, working 40 hours a week. The Computer Science Intern will work alongside the Woolpert Digital Innovation teams on customer-facing demos or research projects and support our task leads.

Responsibilities

 Collaborate and participate with a remote team in designing, developing, and deploying new customer-facing demos. Shawdow customer engineers to gain an understanding of pre-sales lifecycle engineering activities and approaches. Participate in audits and refactoring of Google Cloud infrastructure projects, developing insights into refactoring to best practices. Participate in real-life project management activities for a delivery project.

Qualifications

Don’t have all of these? That’s ok, we know you’re coming to learn. Apply if you think this can be a good fit.

 Be enrolled as a student at an accredited college or university, preferably with at least sophomore status Pursuing a Computer Science, Geospatial, or engineering-related degree, with an interest in geospatial problems and tools Strong written and verbal communication skills Ability to function well in a collaborative, team-oriented environment Exceptional multitasking and time management skills

 Presenting Opportunities and Challenges at Every Turn... 

As a firm that recognizes the importance of developing top talent from within, our employees have access to a wide range of training and coaching programs and are rewarded for their achievements through our excellent benefits package and competitive salaries.

Our vision: http://woolpert.com/about-us/

Equal Opportunity Employer/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities

The contractor will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. However, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the contractor’s legal duty to furnish information. 41 CFR 60-1.35(c)

 To all agencies: Please, no phone calls or emails to any employee of Woolpert or any of our subsidiaries about this requisition. All resumes submitted by search firms/employment agencies to any employee at Woolpert via-email, the internet or in any form and/or method will be deemed the sole property of Woolpert, unless such search firms/employment agencies were engaged by Woolpert's Talent Acquisition Team for this requisition and a valid agreement is in place. In the event a candidate who was submitted outside of Woolpert's applicant process is hired, no fee or payment of any kind will be paid.

Experience Level (if available): Internship

output_json.title: Computer Science Intern
output_json.summary: Woolpert, Inc. seeks a Computer Science Intern for a full-time, remote position.
job_responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy new customer-facing demos
Shadow customer engineers to understand pre-sales lifecycle engineering activities
Participate in audits and refactoring of Google Cloud infrastructure projects
output_json.company_information: Woolpert, Inc. is a national AEG firm with a focus on site and architectural design excellence combined with innovative technology and geospatial applications.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Woolpert is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all federal, state, and local laws regarding employment practices.
